facet_1.name: Shredder
facet_1.effects: Shatters the tree it latched to with Timber Chain upon reaching it. The tree splinters in all directions, damaging and applying a movement speed slow to affected enemy units.

facet_2.name: Twisted Chakram
facet_2.effects: Twisted Chakram is Timbersaw's fourth ability with the selected facet. Launches a secondary saw-blade that deals damage and applies movement speed slow on affected enemy units based on their current health it passes through, then returns to Timbersaw.

effects: Now has an active component that grants Timbersaw a replenishing all damage barrier that gets stronger the more enemy heroes are close
The damage barrier explodes when it expires, damaging nearby enemy units correspondingly to its current barrier value
Grants max Reactive Armor stacks upon cast
Releases a destructive flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing
Deals damage per second, applies a movement speed slow and destroys trees

level_20: +10 Exposure Therapy Heal per Tree Destroyed
level_15: +6 Reactive Armor Max Stacks / +1 Reactive Armor Stack per Hero Attack
level_10: +0.25 Reactive Armor Health Regen per Stack

abilities.name: Exposure Therapy
abilities.description: Timbersaw restores a flat amount of mana per tree destroyed.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Chakram. Talent upgrade additionally restores health per tree destroyed.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: The Shredder's hero model has hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling, excluding passive innate abilities.
abilities.details: Contains multiple hidden innate abilities that require channeling to activate.

ability_1.name: Whirling Death
ability_1.details: Deals damage and bonus damage per destroyed tree within the radius centered around Timbersaw, while reducing the affected enemy hero's primary attribute for a brief duration.
ability_1.description: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the vines and plants of nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.
technical_details: Interrupts Timbersaw's channeling abilities upon cast
Attribute reduction is truncated on HUD
interaction_notes: For Universal heroes, reduces lesser portion of all attributes

ability_2.name: Timber Chain
ability_2.details: Fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling Timbersaw towards it. Deals damage to enemy units within Timbersaw's travel path.
ability_2.description: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.
technical_details: Chain travels until max distance or connects with tree
Grants vision around projectile tip while traveling
Stops pulling when affected by cyclone or forced movement
interaction_notes: Root sources do not interrupt self-forced movement

ability_3.name: Reactive Armor
ability_3.details: Grants bonus armor and bonus health regeneration whenever an enemy hero attacks Timbersaw.
ability_3.description: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.
technical_details: Considers clones, illusions and creep-heroes as heroes
Scepter adds active component with damage barrier
Barrier explodes on expiration or death
interaction_notes: Break sources disable stack gain but don't remove existing stacks
Illusions cannot utilize bonus armor component

ability_4.name: Chakram
ability_4.details: Launches a saw-blade that deals damage, applies a movement speed slow, and cuts down trees in its path when launched and retracted.
technical_details: Grants flying vision at target location
Returns when exceeding max distance or manually recalled
interaction_notes: Can affect same enemy twice (launch and return)
Movement speed slow based on current health percentage

ability_5.name: Twisted Chakram
ability_5.details: Launches a secondary saw-blade that deals damage and applies movement speed slow on affected enemy units based on their current health it passes through, then returns to Timbersaw.
ability_5.description: A happy little accident in the lab turned wild new weapon in the forest.
technical_details: Available only with Twisted Chakram facet
interaction_notes: Independent slow debuff from regular Chakram

ability_6.name: Flamethrower
ability_6.details: Releases a destructive flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Deals damage per second, applies a movement speed slow and destroys trees.
ability_6.description: A single saw can only cut so much. A single spark can burn forever.
interaction_notes: Requires drafting Chakram in Ability Draft
